Package database

Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
database.DatabaseHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseInterface
public class DatabaseHelper extends Object implements DatabaseInterface
This is a database class that handles the database credentials and communicates with the database It is based on the example app DatabaseHandler, and then modified and worked on
Author:
Sturla,
A PreparedStatement function added by @abdiwahab,
